sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import web from "../Images/home_pic.png"; const About = () => { return (
{/*

About Me

Hi! I am Maah. Currently, I am in my fourth-year, pursuing computer science degree at Western University.
I am also working as a Quality-Assurance Engineer Intern at Royal Bank of Canada (RBC) located in
Mississauga, Ontario.

Recently, I discovered my passion for illustration. Thus, I decided to self-taught myself digital illustration from scratch, and bring creative ideas to live.

When I am not coding, or pushing pixels, you'll find me hanging out with friends, working out, or binge-watching on Netflix.

*/}
); }; export default About;
